title: SayOut
summary: Instant voice messenger with instant playback.
description: Instant voice messenger with instant playback.It is simple: you record and send the message - your buddy's phone says this message out loud, instantly.The SayOut messenger saves you time and makes short communication with your family, friends and co-workers much more convenient than ever. With SayOut, you talk instead of typing and listen instead of clicking and reading.It brings your short messaging to a higher level - because nothing compares to hearing the voice of your loved ones.The messenger is very simple:1. Install the SayOut Instant Voice Messenger2. Refresh contacts - it will display all the persons from your phone contacts which have the SayOut installed.3. Tap the person in the contacts list.4. Just talk.5. The phone of the other party says out your message loud instantly. No need to get the message, read it, click anything. Instant playback.6. The other person replays with voice - your phone speaks, instantly.Features:1. Contacts list automatically composed from your phone contacts.2. Instant 3-second voice messaging.4. Notification about received messages with optional instant voice reply.3. Multiple settings to configure privacy - mute all, mute specific contacts, block contacts etc.4. Received messages registry with possibility to listen previous messages.5. Android Wear / Smartwatch support.6. The application is free, no ads, no spam.7. Very simple registration which includes phone number only - no need to provide email or any other information.SayOut supports smart watches with Android Wear OS:1. You receive voice message notification on the smart watch, you can play the received message from the smart watch (the sound will be played from smartphone), you can reply directly from smart watch (using smart watch microphone).2.You can start SayOut application on the smart watch, select contact and record message on the watch and message will be sent to contact.For feedback, please contact us by SayOut.Mobi@gmail.com.Visit our website - www.SayOut.Mobi.
descriptionHTML:
Instant voice messenger with instant playback.
It is simple: you record and send the message - your buddy's phone says this message out loud, instantly.

The SayOut messenger saves you time and makes short communication with your family, friends and co-workers much more convenient than ever. With SayOut, you talk instead of typing and listen instead of clicking and reading.

It brings your short messaging to a higher level - because nothing compares to hearing the voice of your loved ones.

The messenger is very simple:
1. Install the SayOut Instant Voice Messenger
2. Refresh contacts - it will display all the persons from your phone contacts which have the SayOut installed.
3. Tap the person in the contacts list.
4. Just talk.
5. The phone of the other party says out your message loud instantly. No need to get the message, read it, click anything. Instant playback.
6. The other person replays with voice - your phone speaks, instantly.

Features:
1. Contacts list automatically composed from your phone contacts.
2. Instant 3-second voice messaging.
4. Notification about received messages with optional instant voice reply.
3. Multiple settings to configure privacy - mute all, mute specific contacts, block contacts etc.
4. Received messages registry with possibility to listen previous messages.
5. Android Wear / Smartwatch support.
6. The application is free, no ads, no spam.
7. Very simple registration which includes phone number only - no need to provide email or any other information.

SayOut supports smart watches with Android Wear OS:
1. You receive voice message notification on the smart watch, you can play the received message from the smart watch (the sound will be played from smartphone), you can reply directly from smart watch (using smart watch microphone).
2.You can start SayOut application on the smart watch, select contact and record message on the watch and message will be sent to contact.

For feedback, please contact us by SayOut.Mobi@gmail.com.
Visit our website - www.SayOut.Mobi.
comments: Samsung GS4 Great idea. Duly went through registering my fone number but didn't work on my set. Kept giving "Error sending message....." Same problem on my Samsung GS3. What's wrong Dev?
Loved it,  grate application. Enables me communicate without typing and on go. Even if my wife busy, she can hear the message automaticaly and call me back :)
Alex D Great application, works smoothly, the best way to communicate with family, friends and colleagues. Just love it. Must have app.
Alon Great way for quick communication. Much more efficient and faster than writing messages on whatsup. I recommend it.
Great app Exactly what I looked for
Great! Simple, functional and fun way to communicate with colleagues and friends.
recentChanges: Added option to choose the length of the message in the settings (2-5 seconds)
